lead: We collected documents on the E40 waterway project which are available for public use, e. g. brochures, various feasibility studies and an environmental assessment of the project. Also here you can find 17 responses from various state institutions of Belarus to the official inquiries of an NGO "Bahna" about their position on the route arrangement project.

list.text: 06.2016, UN Minutes of an Environmental Council meeting
30.06.2015, Comments by DNEPROBUG on the 1st IntR_En

sections.title: Documents provided on the E40 waterway restoration project
The position of government organizations on the project of main E40 waterway restoration

teaser: Officially: what is the essence of E40 waterway restoration project and what do the government organizations of Belarus think about it.
title: E40
